text: The following lists events that happened in 1940 in Iceland. ==Incumbents== *Monarch - Kristján X *Prime Minister - Hermann Jónasson ==Events== ==Births== Rannveig Guðmundsdóttir *11 January - Örn Steinsen, footballer *15 September - Rannveig Guðmundsdóttir, politician. *16 September - Ómar Ragnarsson, media personality *11 December - Fríða Á. Sigurðardóttir, writer (d. 2010) ==Deaths== ==References== Category:1940s in Iceland Iceland Iceland Category:Years of the 20th century in Iceland
title: 1940 in Iceland
